How to Insert Images

Inserting images into HTML pages must not be done using the "Insert Stuff" button.

Watch this short tutorial video to learn how to properly insert images in place of the placeholder images found in this template page.

Center Aligned Image

This is an image that is center-aligned. To center align the image, add the class "mx-auto" to the image element. This automatically adjusts the margin along the horizontal plane to center the image.
